record.id: field.name="model" and file.name="model" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: model
record.file.name: model

brief.brief: The manufacturer's model identification for this configuration item.
Service Manager uses this field along with manufacturer and serial number to uniquely identify the CI.

detail.detail: Additional information about the model can be viewed by placing the cursor on the field and striking the find (F8) key.
On some forms, the manufacturer and type can be automatically filled from the Model table by placing the cursor in the field and striking the fill (F9) key.
